description: Preparatory Assistance - Crisis Prevention and Recovery  (CPR) Strategy for Timor-Leste

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to reduce the impact of disasters, especially climate change related disasters, on vulnerable communities
subproject.description: The project aims to reorient UNDP Timor-Leste’s  programme and mainstream conflict-sensitivity; develop new initiatives to respond to emerging peace-building and recovery challenges; and integrate the crisis prevention and recovery dimension in the upcoming UNDAF and UNDP Country Programme 2008-2012.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Preparatory Assistance CPR
